chapter.title: Anyframe IAM Overview
chapter.para: Anyframe IAM is Identity and Access Management Framework that provides security solution(user authentication and authorization management) for enterprise application based on JAVA EE. Enterprise application based on JAVA EE has various required item for user authentication and authorization management and developing new functions every time for each enterprise application cost lots of additional money and resources. As the Anyframe IAM based on Spring Security is a framework that provides user authentication and authorization management for enterprise application based on Anyframe or spring Framework, it improves developing productivity, active for user authentication and authorization management and support for developing application of flexible form.

listitem.para: Security of IT field means avoiding access to unauthorized information asset(system/program/dataâ€¦) .
Generally, It includes the two main functions,Authentication and Authorization.

As the strong and flexible security solution for enterprise application, IAM has strength for an application based on Spring. The traditional Servlet specification security has the limited security of considering only the setting for each container, transference issue and web request, but the Spring Security offers service layer and domain object level security. Spring Security is possible to secure under configuration. And its component is very excel at reusing. It is verified through many site under various environments and also the representative Spring subproject with most active community and fast function improvement

IAM Core based on Spring Security : IAM Core that control an authentication and authorization by installing at enterprise application is written based on Spring Security, it is built up based on DB generally. Changing of current application can be minimized when applying to application based on Anyframe or Spring.

IAM Admin Console as a Independent application : Operation of IAM Core is consisted based on DB data and IAM Admin Console is a tool for control a content of DB. It can be consisted as independent type from application because It runs different from conventional enterprise application.
Succeed to Strong Function of Spring Security : Extension and succeed to strong function of Spring Security, providing the function of authentication, authorization that are flexible and extensible.

There is weak point for user,role,secured resource, authorization mapping because Spring Security supports only XML based configuration(simple setting is possible from 2.0.X through Namespace but setting is on XML).

Anyframe IAM apply for making authentication and authorization based on DB. It also standardizes/extends function/refines requirement for management. Through this, IAM Framework is implemented with strength of Spring Security and ease to use at SI project.

sect2.title: IAM Core
sect2.para: Core of Anyframe IAM is based on Spring Security, it is installed at business application based on Anyframe or Spring and authentication,authorization are added by minimizing a previous work code changing. Especially, operating based on extended setting information as DB base is different from Spring Security that save a configuration information as XML file. Anyframe IAM Core has the following feature.

para.emphasis: Service Layer and Access Control of User Defined Resource(ACL)

listitem.para: Authorization checking means controlling for web request generally. IAM Core based on Spring Security can treat not only controlling for web request but security through authorization controlling for main object and service layer. And also it provides Tag and API related to view resource access that provides permission check function for frequently requested screen on the scene.
Grant a security by using a Servlet Filter, Interception through Java AOP and it works by separating from normal operation code section because it works based on Ioc and Lifecycle service of Spring.

As IAM Core of Anyframe supports a generally used DB based configuration, it is more convenient than XML based configuration and able to control a security related configuration with easy and flexible way.

sect2.title: IAM Admin
sect2.para: Anyframe provides a IAM Admin web application to control Database setting for operation of IAM Core. IAM Admin is built up based on technology of jQuery, SpringMVC, HibernateJPA and others and user who have admin authorization can handle and control a DB based secured setting through functions provided by UI of IAM Admin.
